Hello From Tecmo
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2000 Topics (Year Of The Phoenix): Hello From Tecmo
By TecmoUSA on Tuesday, October 3, 2000 - 09:53 am:

Hi Monster Rancher Fans. I just wanted to stop by and say hello to everyone here at Monster Rancher Metropolis. Tecmo appreciates you guys so much for being such loyal fans. Look for Monster Rancher Explorer (GBC) to be in stores later this month! And, there's another Monster Rancher game coming this fall. It's called Monster Rancher Hop-A-About (PSX). We'll have more information on this title as we get closer to lauch in November. Take care and thanks again from Tecmo!

TecmoUSA
